programme.title: Perfect Half
programme.desc: Jeff falls in love with his mothers best friend while she is working with her, but this story eventually turns because Jeff and Joy can never have a relationship.

programme.title: Domestic Spies
programme.desc: Paulinus and Olivia, domestic spies hired by a couple to monitor each other unexpectedly fall in love. Together, they endeavor to rekindle the couples love.

programme.title: My Wife My Angel
programme.desc: Nnadozie marries the best woman for him but his lifestyle will not make him see it. H sells his love away to get rich and couldnt keep the wealth.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: A love story that transcends boundaries. A young teenage couple, who found a once in a lifetime kind of love, have to fight against all odds to stay together.

programme.title: If Tomorrow Comes
programme.desc: Merits cancer diagnosis leads Nneka to urge her boyfriend to date her with the intention of exploiting her before her death. However, the scheme backfires.

programme.title: Made For Me
programme.desc: Wilson and his wife finds themselves in a busy war when his wife has no time for their relationship, so his mother in-law devise a means to save her daughters marriage.

programme.title: Lesson
programme.desc: A lady always finds herself in the wrong side of love and vows never to fall in love again, but meets a young CEO who appears different.

programme.title: Men Cry Too
programme.desc: Linda is every mans dream as she is respects him and everyone can see, their love is admired by all. How can it be that her husband is unhappy when the doors are closed.

programme.title: Heart Of Migodo
programme.desc: The heart of the silent Migodo is about to breathe again as Ugonna connection with the gods will bring peace to the kingdom.

programme.title: Second Chance
programme.desc: The Epic Channel presents a collection of epic stories that showcase the rich cultural heritage of Africa.

programme.title: Little Police
programme.desc: Azonto and Skelewu leaves their village for the city to live with their aunt. After weeks of struggling with no money, they come up with a risky hustle.

programme.title: The Village Girl I Love
programme.desc: Adugo and Benson are madly in love, but this is disrupted by Bensons mum who makes sure that she ends the relationship and propose another woman to her son.

programme.title: Vacant Throne
programme.desc: In a kingdom where sitting on the vacant throne means death, suitors flock to win Princess Ugomas hand, all seeking access to power.

programme.title: Lauras Tears
programme.desc: After Laura lost her mom and dad, her aunt makes her a toy to every man in the community.This eventually led to her death, but her spirit will not rest until she gets justice.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: A love story that transcends boundaries. A young teenage couple, who found a once in a lifetime kind of love, have to fight against all odds to stay together.

programme.title: Wrong Couple
programme.desc: Omenaokolobia, the chosen king declines the throne of Umu Okpa due to uncertainties surrounding the crown. However, the chiefs are determined to seize power.

programme.title: My Life My Fate
programme.desc: Ebere and Nene suffer a great deal in the hands of the villagers who want to take advantage of them, but everything change when Maduka shows up.

programme.title: Please Marry Me
programme.desc: After Ramos comes to the city to meet and squat with his friend, he meets Belinda who has been tasked to get married through an accident. This encounter is about to change his life forever.

programme.title: Olanma My Love
programme.desc: Olanma turns down Ebubes love when he professed it to her. Ebube leaves her for Ene and she cannot handle this as she will do everything to get him back.

programme.title: My Pet Wife
programme.desc: Chief divorce his wife because she couldnt bear him a son, now he is married to a Pet wife. This decision is about to destroy everything he holds dear.

programme.title: Forever Despite
programme.desc: Despite the warnings of her mother, Ngoli gives birth out of wedlock for Uzor who abandons her in the village. This causes more suffering. Will he return for her?

programme.title: My College Girls
programme.desc: Teacher Tony, a dedicated and disciplined educator, would do anything to help his students excel through. However, everything changes when one of his students became pregnant.

programme.title: Beyond Forgiveness
programme.desc: After Obinna lost is ability to get a woman pregnant, he banks on faith and fate, but he is not ready to believe his wife when the time comes.

programme.title: City Husband
programme.desc: Chekwube is going through a lot in her fathers hands because she refuse to bring home a befitting husband for home.

programme.title: Game Of Fate
programme.desc: Elena is a workaholic with zero social life and her mother plays a game of fate at a club on her behalf and wins her a date with Danie. He is bent on making her lose everything.

programme.title: My Siblings And I
programme.desc: A narrative where we see the happenings through the eyes of each sibling in the family, everyones life is subjective to the opinion of others.

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict released from jail finds out that his wife has died and his daughter has leukemia. To encourage his daughter, he returns to the ring.

programme.title: Twin Dragons
programme.desc: When long-lost twins, famous pianist John and criminal Boomer, reunite in Hong Kong and accidentally swap lives, Boomer vows to save John from the clutches of gangsters.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Fok Kit must win a fight to get his boxing studio back but is defeated and badly hurt instead. Will he win again after witnessing the boxers spirit in his master?

programme.title: The Iron Fisted Monk
programme.desc: After learning kung fu from Shaolin, Husker teams up with the Iron Fisted Monk to fight against the Manchus who have killed villagers and raped women.

programme.title: Skinny Tiger and Fatty Dragon
programme.desc: Detective Baldy and his partner Fatty stumble upon the robbery of a jewelry store, which puts them on the trail of a triad crime syndicate.

programme.title: Young Ip Man: Crisis Time
programme.desc: Young Ip Man pursues his studies in Hong Kong in 1917. When the whole school is held hostage during the day of an English speech competition, Ip Man decides to step up...

programme.title: Confession Of Pain
programme.desc: As Detective Heis father-in-law was murdered, his wife enlists the help of private detective Bong to uncover the truth, which may be linked to Hei.

programme.title: Invincible Dragon
programme.desc: An undercover agent helps the police to solve mysterious cases, making him a rising star. However, his impulsive personality drags him into endless troubles.

programme.title: The Postman Fights Back
programme.desc: When postman Ma and three other mismatched allies deliver a secret cargo to the rebel leader, Ma finds himself on a patriotic quest to save the country and himself.

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, a police officer teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: Clean My Name, Mr Coroner
programme.desc: An undercover cop framed for murder is forced to take a coroner hostage so as to prove his innocence in the murder of his partner.

programme.title: The Last Blood
programme.desc: The Dalai Lama and Bees girlfriend are injured by the Red Army. Bee must find the only 3 donors with rare blood type P in 12 hours and fight against the terrorists to save them.

programme.title: The Inspector Wear Skirt II
programme.desc: In this sequel, the female police squad members struggle to blend in with the new recruits, and must also join the Special Duty Unit to capture an escaped prisoner.

programme.title: Kung Fu Monster
programme.desc: In the Ming Dynasty, imperial guard Ocean secretly frees a kind monster gifted by Brunei, sparking a palace bounty and a frantic hunt to capture it.

programme.title: Iceman The Time Traveler
programme.desc: In this sequel, the four imperial guards are defrosted and reanimated in modern times. With different motives in mind, they strive to find their way back in time...

programme.title: Operation Bangkok
programme.desc: A military veteran and an undercover cop lead a team to rescue the hostages captured by a band of thugs in an island outside of Bangkok.

programme.title: Whampoa Blues
programme.desc: Cong and Jin are students of Whampoa Military Training School. They incidentally discover an ammunition smuggling plan and get themselves into danger...

programme.title: Guns and Roses
programme.desc: Jin Shui risks all to save his family, fleeing France with the help of his friend. Amid challenges, Jin Shui faces a dilemma: love or loyalty to his friend.

programme.title: Disciples Of Shaolin Temple
programme.desc: A young man evades an arranged marriage to go to Shaolin Temple, where he joins other disciples to fight against an expelled disciple taking revenge on the Abbot.

programme.title: Mr Vampire II
programme.desc: Grave robbing archeologists discover vampires immobilized by paper spells. While transporting them, the vampires revive and escape. A local herbalist sets out to destroy them.

programme.title: Black Cat
programme.desc: A tough and rebellious girl is recruited by the CIA and trained to be a deadly assassin. Her life changes when she gets to know about real life from killing.

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: Yu Xiang and her daughter move into a new neighbourhood where everyones life seems perfect. However, dark secrets and horror have raided each family from the inside.

programme.title: Kungfu Cyborg: Metallic Attraction
programme.desc: An advanced cyborg cop is created as a crime fighter for the villagers in 2046. It can overcome most challenges except for love and battling a rogue cyborg.

programme.title: Yesterday Once More
programme.desc: Mr and Mrs To, a pair of divorced professional jewel thieves, target to steal the same ruby necklace. A cat-and-mouse game begins as their love re-blossoms along the way.

programme.title: Righting Wrongs
programme.desc: When an important witness and his family are brutally murdered, a furious and disillusioned lawyer decides to dish out his own vigilante justice with his fist.

programme.title: Fist of Legend
programme.desc: Chen Zhen fights against the Black Dragon Society, who uses his comrades to test a new drug used to boost the strength of the Japanese troops in war.

programme.title: Century of the Dragon
programme.desc: An undercover detective is assigned to take down a triad boss, but as their friendship develops over time, the detective is torn between duty and brotherhood.

programme.title: Triad
programme.desc: Hong Kongs up-and-coming actor William Chan stars as a gangster who rise through the ranks to become the no. 1 triad gangster in Hong Kong!

programme.title: The Magnificent Butcher
programme.desc: In this classic martial arts comedy, Sammo Hung stars as Lam Sai Wing, the disciple of Wong Fei Hung, who gets embroiled in a feud with a rival kung fu school.

programme.title: Bounty Hunters
programme.desc: Five bounty hunters are tasked to track down the culprit of a series of bombings plaguing a hotel group in Bangkok. Can they solve the crime and finally collect the bounty?

programme.title: The Moon Warrior
programme.desc: A benevolent fisherman living a simple life is reluctantly drawn into helping a noble emperor regain his throne from his evil brother.

programme.title: Dragon Squad
programme.desc: A veteran cop leads a team of Interpol agents to track down ruthless mercenaries who kidnapped an accused crime lord on his way to court.
